title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Fixed raw output syntax in GitHub Actions docs to prevent rendering issues.
Enhanced CONTRIBUTING guidelines visibility by adding repository tab/sidebar links.
Made `title` frontmatter field required in documentation files.
Added development placeholders and toggles for new landing page layouts (bespoke, discovery, journey).
Removed feedback link from search overlay UI.
Improved ScrollButton error handling for missing H1 elements.
Added UI string definitions for new landing page components.

- Added development placeholders and toggles for new landing page layouts (bespoke, discovery, journey).
- Removed feedback link from search overlay UI.
- Improved ScrollButton error handling for missing H1 elements.
- Added UI string definitions for new landing page components.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
